DOC.brief_summary: The objective study determine effect glycemic response add various dos OatWell28XF Quaker Instant Oatmeal order : 1 ) describe dose-response curve 2 ) If possible , identify minimum level OatWell28XF , add serve Quaker Instant Oatmeal , would result glycemic response least 20 % less elicited β-glucan-free cereal .
DOC.criteria: Male nonpregnant female , 1875 year age , inclusive Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 20.0 < 35 kg/m² screening ( visit 1 ) . Willing maintain habitual diet , physical activity pattern , body weight throughout trial refrain smoking 12hr prior visit . Willing maintain current dietary supplement use throughout trial . On test day , subject agrees take dietary supplement dismissal GI lab . Failure comply result reschedule test visit . Normal fast serum glucose ( < 7.0mmol/L capillary correspond whole blood glucose < 6.3mmol/L ) . Willing abstain alcohol consumption avoid vigorous physical activity 24 h prior test visit . Absence health condition would prevent fulfillment study requirement judge Investigator basis medical history . Understanding study procedure willing provide inform consent participate study authorization release relevant protect health information study investigator . Failure meet one inclusion criterion Known history AIDS , hepatitis , history presence clinically important endocrine ( include Type 1 Type 2 diabetes mellitus ) , cardiovascular ( include , limited , atherosclerotic disease , history myocardial infarction , peripheral arterial disease , stroke ) , pulmonary , biliary GI disorder . Use medication know influence carbohydrate metabolism , include , limited adrenergic blocker , diuretic , thiazolidinediones , metformin systemic corticosteroid within 4 week screen visit , condition might , opinion Dr. Wolever , president GI Testing , either : 1 ) make participation dangerous subject others , 2 ) affect result . Major trauma surgical event within 3 month screen . Unwillingness inability comply experimental procedure follow GI Labs safety guideline . Known intolerance , sensitivity allergy ingredient study product . Extreme dietary habit , judge Investigator ( i.e . Atkins diet , high protein diet , etc ) . Uncontrolled hypertension ( systolic blood pressure ≥160 mm Hg diastolic blood pressure ≥100 mm Hg define average blood pressure measure screening . Change body weight > 3.5kg within 4 week screen visit . Presence sign symptom active infection within 5 prior test visit . If infection occur study period , test visit reschedule sign symptom resolve treatment ( i.e . antibiotic therapy ) complete least 5 prior test visit . History cancer prior two year , except nonmelanoma skin cancer . Recent history ( within 12 month screen ) strong potential alcohol substance abuse . Alcohol abuse define > 14 drink per week ( 1 drink=12 oz beer , 5 oz wine , 1.5 oz distil spirit ) . Exposure nonregistered drug product within 30 prior screening .
